source.description: Mobile app assets and templates for the InsightPulse AI platform

items.title: Odoo iOS App Store Client (SwiftUI + Fastlane)
what_to_lift: Package.swift — Swift Package, iOS 17+, no external deps.
5 native capabilities: SSO (ASWebAuthenticationSession), biometric gate (LocalAuthentication), document scan (VNDocumentCameraViewController), offline queue (CoreData), push + deep links (APNs).
Fastlane: test, build_testflight, release_appstore lanes with match code signing.

items.title: Mobile Release Readiness Workbook (Ops Advisor extension — 10 rules)
what_to_lift: platform/advisor/rulesets/mobile-release-readiness.yaml — 10 rules (CI, code signing, security, privacy, QA).
platform/advisor/sources/appstoreconnect.ts — App Store Connect API v1 check functions.
Workbook UI: /advisor/workbooks/mobile — pass/fail/skip per rule, remediation steps, Export JSON.
API route: GET /api/advisor/workbooks/mobile — evaluates filesystem + ASC + advisor run findings.
